00099 typedef struct DBusUserInfo  DBusUserInfo;
00101 typedef struct DBusGroupInfo DBusGroupInfo;
00102 
00106 struct DBusUserInfo
00107 {
00108   dbus_uid_t  uid;            
00109   dbus_gid_t  primary_gid;    
00110   dbus_gid_t *group_ids;      
00111   int         n_group_ids;    
00112   char       *username;       
00113   char       *homedir;        
00114 };
00115 
00119 struct DBusGroupInfo
00120 {
00121   dbus_gid_t  gid;            
00122   char       *groupname;      
00123 };

00157 typedef enum
00158 {
00159   DBUS_FORCE_STDIN_NULL = (1 << 0),
00160   DBUS_FORCE_STDOUT_NULL = (1 << 1),
00161   DBUS_FORCE_STDERR_NULL = (1 << 2)
00162 } DBusEnsureStandardFdsFlags;
